website_summaries.verdict: Microsoft's Surface Laptop 2 gets a big speed boost and a new color option, but is otherwise a minimal update to the first version.
pros: The Surface Laptop 2 ups the default RAM and upgrades to much faster processors
The new matte black color option looks great
cons: Other than a CPU/RAM bump, there's very little new about this
The black color option is only available on more expensive configurations
No USB-C, a rarity for premium laptops

customer_reviews.title: Perfect and portable work companion
customer_reviews.text: This burgundy color is just as beautiful in person as it is online. Microsoft’s continued perfect shot at making hardware. I love the keyboard and precision engineering that went into making this pc.
customer_reviews.author: Albert Teixeira

customer_reviews.title: Purchase! Great Battery & Lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: This laptop is absolutely amazing, lightweight, portable, and starts up quickly. I haven't had any issues with it and the battery really does seem to last for a long time. I leave it on hibernate a lot, and I don't have to plug it in frequently. I am a novelist by trade, and this is the perfect tool to use. It's a little bigger than a sheet of paper. It also is excellent for school work, and any other various projects you may have. Definitely worth the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: M. S. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Considering price... this laptop beats the MacBook Air. Light, this, great material and style.
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy Haas

customer_reviews.title: Light weight
customer_reviews.text: Like: its really lightweight, fast and overall pretty good. Dont like: face recognition works for me maybe 4/10 times and battery life is much shorter than described. If i watch netflix (2 hr movie) it lasts about 4 hrs. The most it has lasted for me has been around 5-6 hrs.
customer_reviews.author: Lau M.

customer_reviews.title: DON'T BUY HERE PLEASE
customer_reviews.text: This laptop stopped working after 2 months using it. When I brought it to the Microsoft store they told me it was 6 months old (the warranty already was 6 months old) and the person who bought it could have done anything with this computer. So PLEASE dont buy your laptop here. Do yourself a favor and go directly to the Microsoft store.
customer_reviews.author: JUAN SEBASTIAN RIVERA MARIN

customer_reviews.title: Great laptop
customer_reviews.text: we've had this laptop for about 4 months. we've been extremely impressed with its performance. Zero issues. we use it for web surfing, running e-commerce sight for small business, word processing, excel etc. I can't remember the name of the cool fabric-feeling surface thats around the trackpad (alcanterra maybe?) but that feels great after 4 months still. Not cheezy looking (or feeling) at all.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Stone

customer_reviews.title: Weak sauce
customer_reviews.text: Weak machine in an otherwise promising form factor. 8gb ram is just not enough to power much more than Windows 10 and a web browser these days. I couldn’t run my normal apps to do standard work (nothing intensive like video or photo editing) with this machine without it stalling and needing to be rebooted several times a day. Either I received bad hardware or this is just a very weak setup. It could also be Windows is still a very buggy OS.
customer_reviews.author: Robert J.

customer_reviews.title: Microsoft Surface Laptop 2 - great laptop
customer_reviews.text: Loved the laptop! But, Amazon insisted I return it, so I did. I purchased it with my Amazon Prime Credit Card and chose the 18 month no interest feature, but this was not what came on my statement. After millions of phone calls back and forth between Amazon and the credit card - the only solution that Amazon could come up with was to return it. No one would honor the promotion and no one could give it to me. This is very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa A. Gambino

customer_reviews.title: Awesome laptop
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love my Surface Laptop. It's lightweight, the battery has good life and I love the touch screen. I didn't purchase through Amazon, however. They could not ship to my area. It was ordered from a 3rd party vendor and it was shipped, but 4 days later UPS sent it back as they could not ship to my area which took another several days to be returned before my account was credited. Anything with a NiCad battery cannot be shipped via air. I ended up buying the laptop locally (which was brought in via ship).
customer_reviews.author: Van

customer_reviews.title: Battery cord is a bit short.
customer_reviews.text: Laptop 2 i5 for under $1,000 has been spectacular since received. Highly recommended for students, professionals, business travelers, and especially anyone who types a lot; the keyboard is extremely comfortable. Because the laptop is compact it is limited to one (1) USB port & one (1) on the battery cord / charger pack. Being not much of a touch-screen person myself - the "shut down and drag" feature is really nice when packing up and on the go. Overall a quick and easy to use laptop. Great laptop for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best laptop I've ever owned!
customer_reviews.text: Everything, starting from the build quality and finish make me fall in love with this laptop everyday. It's been my faithful companion for a about a year and a half now. The battery life is still great (probably not as good as a MacBook, but it's good nonetheless). The best Alcantara still looks good (but that could be because of the darker color option I chose - Burgundy). This review would be incomplete without talking about the keyboard; this laptop undoubtedly has the best feel-good keyboard typing experience. The touch screen does get greasy at times; alcohol wipes come in handy for this purpose. Anyone out there looking for a faithful and dependable laptop, look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Maddy

customer_reviews.title: Heavy, beautiful picture, too expensive, and battery life is low. iPad Pro wins.
customer_reviews.text: My iPad Pro outdoes this laptop by a gazillion with battery life, the weight of this lap top is more than 3 of my iPad Pro and if I was able to use my iPad for windows applications I wouldn’t need anything else except more storage, so while the surface book 2 is amazing it is second rate compared to my I pad pro.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Howell

customer_reviews.title: It was worth it
customer_reviews.text: It was bought as a gift and the feedback is that it has lived up to every expectation.
customer_reviews.author: ZS

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is my first Microsoft laptop. I had a version surface and it was well made but basically a toy. This Surface Laptop is an outstanding utility machine. Email, web surfing, office tools. Very fast. Very portable. Much more responsive than my i7 dell box it is supplanting.
customer_reviews.author: Robert G. Coach

customer_reviews.title: A Very Good Computer
customer_reviews.text: The Surface is a very good computer. The keyboard is comfortable. Thankfully I haven't tested it "liquid proof" design. Screen clarity is nice. It holds a battery charge as good as every other lap top I've owned. Upgrades to the Windows operating system are welcome, and a huge improvement. Overall I'm pleased with the lap top.
customer_reviews.author: Sean

customer_reviews.title: Best study laptop for school.
customer_reviews.text: I think this is the perfect balance between laptop and tablet. I love using it in bed. Perfect balance and light weight. This should be standard for college students.

customer_reviews.title: 4 months of good use before it died out of warranty
customer_reviews.text: 4 months after my husband insisted on buying this ridiculously expensive laptop the battery won't hold a charge. The laptop is useless and the warranty doesn't cover battery issues. I told him to get a cheap laptop from New Egg for $250, my computer is going on 5 years. It was a fine computer for about 4 months, the touch screen worked great and it was a very light weight computer. Maybe we just got a lemon.

customer_reviews.title: The keyboard is not decent enough
customer_reviews.text: I bought this laptop last december, after two weeks right shift key started sounds so weird when I click it but other keys are okay and sometimes the touchpad is aggressive to use it goes so fast mm just behave unusual. Other than this I love this laptop, so fast, thin, good battery life and nice speakers. I don't like the touch screen on my laptop so I just disabled the driver of it, boom I don't have to care about stupid display.

customer_reviews.title: Premium build quality, great screen and trackpad.
customer_reviews.text: Def pricy compared to competition, but if u want great build quality and a second to none screen and trackpad this it it. Battery could be better but the processor is snappy and the keyboard is the best. If quality is of top importance this is great.

customer_reviews.title: Underpowered and poorly engineered, but stylish and portable.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: Thin/Light Looks good Decent battery life Cons: Magnetic connector for docking station and power is garbage. Takes more work than a normal connector. With the Surface docking station, can barely drive another monitor. Forget having YouTube on one screen and working on the other, laptop isn't powerful enough. There needs to be a bevel around the screen. Put it in your laptop bag for 5 minutes and dust/hair gets onto the screen. Surface scratches very easily. No cable management for the power cable. Alcantara palm rests get dirty very easily and cannot be easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Battery timing is so far upto 9 hours on best performance mode
customer_reviews.text: The battery timing is great, but the charging is slow it takes about 2.5 hours to fully charge the laptop. The sound quality is normal not recommended for listening music. Face recognition is not cool sometimes it doesn't even recognize but when it does it is very quick. There is no fan noise in this laptop, even if the CPU is working at its fully capacity. I don't know after how many years or months the battery will start loosing its battery health
customer_reviews.author: Arsalan

customer_reviews.title: I love my new computer.
customer_reviews.text: I love the whole setup of the surface laptop 2. I needed to buy a computer that ran on windows for one of my other previously purchased items from amazon and I am glad I went with the surface!
customer_reviews.author: Wendy

customer_reviews.title: A great laptop for grad life

customer_reviews.title: Quality of this product is superb - needs brighter screen

Thank god I bought a playstation in the past and never an Xbox. Microsoft, you suck! I have to give it one star as that is Amazon's review requirement but it deserves no stars.

Being a student in a coding major, I feel like I use the laptop an abnormal amount besides for the Netflix binge and the laptop ran everything smoothly, including a few video games.
